Package model.MainGame

Class OthelloGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MainGame.OthelloGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game
    public class OthelloGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OthelloGame​(Player player1, Player player2, Board board)
      First constructor to construct a new game with new players and new board game
      OthelloGame​(Player player1, Player player2, Board board, int turn)
      Second constructor to construct a deep copy game with the same players, board, and store the current turn.

      • CheckAbove

        public boolean CheckAbove​(Move move)
        Scan all above points of this move to check whener the above direction is valid direction or not; It will check the nearest first . If it is different mark , continue check the next point in the same direction until find a point which has same mark = > valid move
        Parameters:
        move - the move to check
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid, false otherwise
